Typedefs
EMAC LLD Callback Functions
EMAC LLD Module API

Typedefs

typedef void EMAC_RX_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num, EMAC_PKT_DESC_T *p_desc)
 This function is used to call back the network application when a packet is received. Registered with driver at time of emac_open.
 
typedef EMAC_PKT_DESC_T * EMAC_ALLOC_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num, uint32_t pkt_size)
 This function is used to call back the network application to allocate a packet descriptor with packet buffer allocated from the application packet queue.Registered with driver at time of emac_open.
 
typedef void EMAC_FREE_PKT_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num, EMAC_PKT_DESC_T *p_desc)
 This function is used to call back the network application to free a packet descriptor to the application packet queue. Registered with driver at time of emac_open.
 
typedef void EMAC_RX_MGMT_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num, EMAC_IOCTL_CMD_RESP_T *pCmdResp)
 This function is used to call back the network application when a management message response is received from ICSSG FW. Registered with driver at time of emac_open.
 
typedef void EMAC_TX_TS_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num, uint32_t ts_id, uint64_t ts, bool isValid)
 This function is used to call back the network application when a TX Timestamp response is received from the ICSSG firmware. Registered with driver at time of emac_open. More...
 

Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef void EMAC_TX_TS_CALLBACK_FN_T(uint32_t port_num,uint32_t ts_id,uint64_t ts,bool isValid)

This function is used to call back the network application when a TX Timestamp response is received from the ICSSG firmware. Registered with driver at time of emac_open.

Note
Only supported for am65xx SOC
